pages.text: A Blade corroded by the power of the Wither. Energy from The Sange Blade and the Wither has made the Blade gain the Wither power.$(br2)It may harm the swordman who is wielding it.$(br2)Make a BladeStand with BladeSoulIngot, place the Anonymity-Nameless- Blade on it, then summon the Wither near it.
Let the Wither's explosion shock waves strike the Blade, making it resonate and gain the Wither power.
